title: Epic: Core IR (System F_C)
body:
Define the Core IR modelled on GHC's System F_C. Enables future interop: import GHC's `-ddump-simpl` output. No Core-to-Core optimisations (all deferred to GRIN). Includes typechecker and desugarer.

**Key decisions**: #6, #20 in DESIGN.md
**Sub-tasks to split later**: Core IR types, typechecker, desugarer, name uniqueness strategy
